description:
Aiolia defeats God Warrior Frodi. However, he passes out as the mysterious marks reappear. Lyfia runs about to save Aiolia, but she, too, collapses. When she awakens, she finds she’s been taken in by a boy and Aries Mu with a Gold Cloth Box.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 暴け!ユグドラシルの秘密
